int sceIoWrite (  SceUID  fd,
const void *  data,
SceSize  size
) 
 

Write output

Parameters:
fd - Opened file descriptor to write to
data - Pointer to the data to write
size - Size of data to write
Returns:
The number of bytes written
Example:
 bytes_written = sceIoWrite(fd, data, 100);
